snippet.title: Scrabdackle - 2021 demo trailer
snippet.description:
You've never left the wizard academy before, but today you were knocked out the window! A novice stranded in an unfamiliar world, you're now undertaking a journey to find your way back home. Along the way, get to know the land of Scrabdackle for the first time - and the impact wizardkind has unknowingly had upon it.

Scrabdackle is a hand-drawn action/adventure game about going exploring, with non-linear progression and a unique mix of skill-based challenge and accessible gameplay. It features a vast, intricate overworld, tight and responsive combat, cheeky banter, and pages of lore to discover – all under a coat of playful charm.

Join the Scrabdackle community!
https://discord.gg/bUY6HP8

All music and art created and owned by jakefriend.
